channel.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
channel.description:
Lets say i find a hilarious picture on 4chan.
This one is was created completely by the users of 4chan, or so im lead to believe [URL=http://img363.imageshack.us/my.php?image=1227153586462sry3.jpg][IMG]http://img363.imageshack.us/img363/7282/1227153586462sry3.th.jpg[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img363.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]
would taking that pic, and making something like a tshirt or a poster out of it be cause for someone to sue or complain?
Now, same question but for this one. Its a picture of something that has been altered. [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/7798/1227153805994sfa7.jpg[/img][/URL]
And finaly, a picture from 4chan, that is virtualy unchanged. [URL=http://img151.imageshack.us/my.php?image=1227151637514stl3.jpg][IMG]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/8730/1227151637514stl3.th.jpg[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img151.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]
can i go about selling things with pictures on them found on an anonymous forum without fear of getting in trouble?

item.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

internet jokes belong on the internet, nowhere else

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on plajurizing laws

item.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Unless you have rights or have paid you’ll be voiding copyright laws.
Selling someone else idea is illegal and yes, they can sue you for not offering compensation.

Just alter it a lot.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on plajurizing laws

item.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:5, topic:245298”]so to what extent can i use something on the internet? Are 4chan users plagiarizing things when they take then and then post them on the forum?

Would i be plagiarizing if i took those pictures and put them onto posters/tshirts and sold them?

All that link did was raise more questions cause it hazed everything more.[/quote]

Simply taking it and putting it on your forum isn’t nice. Don’t know what they could do though, besides ask you to take it off if it’s that serious to them and maybe sue you.

Taking it and editing it, same as above maybe.

Now if you had paid for it and hosted it on your site that would be much worse. Or if you just straight took it and sold it on something. They’d want royalties.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on plajurizing laws

item.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

so to what extent can i use something on the internet? Are 4chan users plagiarizing things when they take then and then post them on the forum?

Would i be plagiarizing if i took those pictures and put them onto posters/tshirts and sold them?

All that link did was raise more questions cause it hazed everything more.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on plajurizing laws

item.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I’ll assume you mean “Plagiarism”, in which case you should probably check wikipedia on it to make sure you’re not confusing it with something else.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on plajurizing laws

item.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

how about if i redraw them myself?

Stealing the idea, but its not the same picture then

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on plajurizing laws

item.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

No, it is illegal.

You need to ask for/buy consent from the author in order to sell.

You can probably do it small-scale with your friends though and not get fined.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on plajurizing laws

item.title: Need some help on plajurizing laws
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

Lets say i find a hilarious picture on 4chan.

This one is was created completely by the users of 4chan, or so im lead to believe

would taking that pic, and making something like a tshirt or a poster out of it be cause for someone to sue or complain?

Now, same question but for this one. Its a picture of something that has been altered.

And finaly, a picture from 4chan, that is virtualy unchanged.

can i go about selling things with pictures on them found on an anonymous forum without fear of getting in trouble?

Read full topic
